snippet: The collapse of the illegal gold mine occurred late Wednesday night in western Colombia, and rescuers were searching for other miners believed to be missing.
abstract: At least three people are killed in collapse of illegal gold mine in western Colombia; local news media reports that many miners are believed to be missing.

byline.contributor: Susan Abad contributed reporting from Bogotá, Colombia.

lead_paragraph: The collapse of the illegal gold mine occurred late Wednesday night in western Colombia, and rescuers were searching for other miners believed to be missing.

headline.main: At Least 3 Die in Collapse of Gold Mine
headline.print_headline: At Least 3 Die in Collapse of Gold Mine
